reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting public engagement and consultation on China's design and delivery of energy projects

description.narrative: The project is designed to share UK and international experience in developing more effective public engagement and consultation, in order to improve the planning and implementation of both China and UK energy projects. This will include sharing experience to improve government, regulators' and companies' ability to understand and address public hopes and concerns with regard to the delivery of energy infrastructure plans in China and the UK, through effective communication and engagement.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
